verses.verse: Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> gathered together <S%H6908><s%> all their armies <S%H4264><s%> to Aphek <S%H663><s%>: and the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> pitched <S%H2583><s%> by a fountain <S%H5869><s%> which is in Jezreel <S%H3157><s%>.

And the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> passed on <S%H5674><s%> by hundreds <S%H3967><s%>, and by thousands <S%H505><s%>: but David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> passed on <S%H5674><s%> in the rereward <S%H314><s%> with Achish <S%H397><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, What do these Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> here? And Achish <S%H397><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, Is not this David <S%H1732><s%>, the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which hath been with me these days <S%H3117><s%>, or these years <S%H8141><s%>, and I have found <S%H4672><s%> no fault <S%H3972><s%> in him since <S%H3117><s%> he fell <S%H5307><s%> unto me unto this day <S%H3117><s%>?

And the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> were wroth <S%H7107><s%> with him; and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Make <S%H7725><s%> this fellow <S%H376><s%> return <S%H7725><s%>, that he may go again <S%H7725><s%> to his place <S%H4725><s%> which thou hast appointed <S%H6485><s%> him, and let him not go down <S%H3381><s%> with us to battle <S%H4421><s%>, lest in the battle <S%H4421><s%> he be an adversary <S%H7854><s%> to us: for wherewith should he reconcile <S%H7521><s%> himself unto his master <S%H113><s%>? should it not be with the heads <S%H7218><s%> of these men <S%H582><s%>?

Is not this David <S%H1732><s%>, of whom they sang <S%H6030><s%> one to another in dances <S%H4246><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Saul <S%H7586><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> his thousands <S%H505><s%>, and David <S%H1732><s%> his ten thousands <S%H7233><s%>?

¶ Then Achish <S%H397><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Surely, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, thou hast been upright <S%H3477><s%>, and thy going out <S%H3318><s%> and thy coming in <S%H935><s%> with me in the host <S%H4264><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%>: for I have not found <S%H4672><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in thee since the day <S%H3117><s%> of thy coming <S%H935><s%> unto me unto this day <S%H3117><s%>: nevertheless the lords <S%H5633><s%> favour <S%H2896><s%> thee not <S%H5869><s%>.

Wherefore now return <S%H7725><s%>, and go <S%H3212><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>, that thou displease <S%H6213><s%> <S%H7451><s%> <S%H5869><s%> not the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.

¶ And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Achish <S%H397><s%>, But what have I done <S%H6213><s%>? and what hast thou found <S%H4672><s%> in thy servant <S%H5650><s%> so long as <S%H3117><s%> I have been with thee <S%H6440><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>, that I may not go <S%H935><s%> fight <S%H3898><s%> against the enemies <S%H341><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>?

And Achish <S%H397><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%>, I know <S%H3045><s%> that thou art good <S%H2896><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%>, as an angel <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>: notwithstanding the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> have said <S%H559><s%>, He shall not go up <S%H5927><s%> with us to the battle <S%H4421><s%>.

Wherefore now rise up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> with thy master's <S%H113><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> that are come <S%H935><s%> with thee: and as soon as ye be up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and have light <S%H215><s%>, depart <S%H3212><s%>.

So David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> to depart <S%H3212><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, to return <S%H7725><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>. And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to Jezreel <S%H3157><s%>.
